This Tenancy Contract, the “Contract” is made in two original copies ,on date
,by and between The Tenant as specifically mentioned in Schedule II, AND The Landlord as specifically mentioned in Schedule II (Together referred to as Parties and singly as Party) In consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the parties agree as follows:

Subject to the terms and conditions of the Contract set forth herewith the Landlord agrees to rent to the Tenant and Tenant agrees to rent from the Landlord a property unit as described in Schedule II, the “Unit” for the Tenancy Period as described in Schedule II exclusively for the purpose of Permitted Use as described in Schedule II in consideration to the Rental Value as described in Schedule II to be paid by the Tenant to the Land Lord as per payment plan described in Schedule III.

Fair Use Policy, as implemented by the Landlord and amended from time to time, is applicable on use of cooling/chiller service, “Service”. Customers are mandated to not to misuse the Service in such a way that it is reasonably considered by Landlord to be fraudulent or unreasonable use, to be contrary to the way the service is intended to be used or to adversely affect the landlord’s financial position, affect the quality of service or affect, directly or indirectly, rights of other customers/tenants in the facility. In such a case per month fixed billing will be overwritten with the meter reading and an amount as equals as the bill calculated based on the meter reading will be recovered from and paid by the Tenant “ APPLY IN RAK ONLY”
